headline: PARAMOUNT APPOINTS DENNIS K. CINELLI AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND ADDS ANDREW CAMPION TO ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS
summary: Paramount, a Skydance Corporation (Nasdaq: PSKY) today announced that Dennis K. Cinelli will join the company's executive leadership team as Chief Financial Officer, effective January 15, 2026, and as such has resigned his Board of Directors seat. A highly accomplished financial executive, Cinelli has helped grow some of the world's most innovative companies, including Uber, where, as Head of Mobility for the U.S. and Canada, he played a critical role in expanding the business and was instrument

headline: 2026’s Biggest AI Trends: Self-Driving Cars | TSLA Stock, GOOGL Stock, UBER Stock, NVDA Stock
summary: 24/7 Wall St. Analysts Eric Bleeker and Austin Smith are kicking the New Year off in style with 12 trends for AI investors to watch in 2026. Over the course of 12 videos, the two will share their thoughts on everything from the memory explosion to software stocks to robotics. In this video, Eric and Austin focus on recent developments in self-driving cars. Specifically, NVIDIA just launched its new Alpamayo suite of self-driving models. That move serves as a level of validation to Tesla's vision-only strategy, but also could create more competition for Tesla as well. Eric and Austin also look at the growth rate of Waymo's ridership in 2026.

headline: Wall Street Analysts Believe Uber (UBER) Could Rally 31.3%: Here's is How to Trade
summary: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 31.3% in Uber (UBER). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.

headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Uber (UBER): Read This Before Placing a Bet
